price: If We willed, We could [destroy you all and] replace you with angels, succeeding you on earth.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
